==Walkthrough==
# Drop down into the first room and defeat the enemies.
#* {{Enemy List|Cryo Slime*2;Electro Slime*2;Large Cryo Slime;Large Electro Slime|#*}}
# Open the door and head down the hallway
# Defeat the enemies in the hallway to open the door
#* {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter*2;Hilichurl Shooter*2|#*}}
# Defeat the enemies that appear after the door opens
#* {{Enemy List|Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard*2|#*}}
# Enter the room and defeat the enemies
#* {{Enemy List|Electro Hilichurl Shooter;Cryo Hilichurl Shooter;Cryo Slime*2;Electro Slime*2|#*}}
# Break the two rock walls in the room to uncover some chests
# Enter the next room and defeat the enemies
#* {{Enemy List|Cryo Slime*3;Electro Slime*3;Large Cryo Slime;Large Electro Slime;Mutant Electro Slime;Hydro Abyss Mage|#*}}
#** A couple Large Electro Slimes will spawn when the Hydro Abyss Mage reaches low health, but defeating the mage will cause these slimes to despawn.
